parameters.name: farmId
parameters.description: The farm ID connected to the tasks.

parameters.name: queueId
parameters.description: The queue ID connected to the tasks.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The job ID for the tasks.

parameters.name: stepId
parameters.description: The step ID for the tasks.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user or system that created this resource.

nested_items.name: runStatus
nested_items.description: The run status of the task.

nested_items.name: targetRunStatus
nested_items.description: The run status on which the started.

nested_items.name: failureRetryCount
nested_items.description: The number of times that the task failed and was retried.

nested_items.name: int
nested_items.description: A signed integer represented as a string.

nested_items.name: float
nested_items.description: A double precision IEEE-754 floating point number represented as a string.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: A file system path represented as a string.

nested_items.name: startedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource started running.

nested_items.name: endedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource ended running.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource was updated.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The user or system that updated this resource.

nested_items.name: latestSessionActionId
nested_items.description: The latest session action for the task.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If Deadline Cloud returns nextToken, then there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. To retrieve the next page, call the operation again using the returned token. Keep all other arguments unchanged. If no results remain, then nextToken is set to null. Each pagination token expires after 24 hours. If you provide a token that isn't valid, then you receive an HTTP 400 ValidationException error.
